00001 /** @file troom.cpp
00002  *  @brief Room Unit Test Implementation
00003  *  @author Efstathios Xatzikiriakidis
00004  *
00005  *  This is the unit test for the "Room" class.
00006  */
00007 
00008 #include "troom.h"
00009 
00010 int gRoomNumber = 1; /**< Room number value (test data). */
00011 int gRoomFloor  = 1; /**< Room floor value (test data). */
00012 int gCapacity   = 2; /**< Room capacity value (test data). */
00013 
00014 /** Room Constructor Test Method
00015  *  @brief This method tests the constructor of the "Room" class.
00016  *  @author Efstathios Xatzikiriakidis
00017  */
00018 void TRoom::testConstructor ()
00019 {
00020   Room r (gRoomNumber, gRoomFloor, gCapacity);
00021 
00022   QVERIFY (r.getRoomNumber () == gRoomNumber  &&
00023            r.getRoomFloor ()  == gRoomFloor   &&
00024            r.getCapacity ()   == gCapacity);
00025 }
00026 
00027 /** Room Number Test Method
00028  *  @brief This method tests the Number set/get methods of the "Room" class.
00029  *  @author Efstathios Xatzikiriakidis
00030  */
00031 void TRoom::testRoomNumber ()
00032 {
00033   Room r;
00034   r.setRoomNumber (gRoomNumber);
00035 
00036   QVERIFY (r.getRoomNumber () == gRoomNumber);
00037 }
00038 
00039 /** Room Floor Test Method
00040  *  @brief This method tests the Floor set/get methods of the "Room" class.
00041  *  @author Efstathios Xatzikiriakidis
00042  */
00043 void TRoom::testRoomFloor ()
00044 {
00045   Room r;
00046   r.setRoomFloor (gRoomFloor);
00047 
00048   QVERIFY (r.getRoomFloor () == gRoomFloor);
00049 }
00050 
00051 /** Room Capacity Test Method
00052  *  @brief This method tests the Capacity set/get methods of the "Room" class.
00053  *  @author Efstathios Xatzikiriakidis
00054  */
00055 void TRoom::testCapacity ()
00056 {
00057   Room r;
00058   r.setCapacity (gCapacity);
00059 
00060   QVERIFY (r.getCapacity () == gCapacity);
00061 }

00063 QTEST_MAIN (TRoom)
